root: ^Ah it’s you Guang Jiyi! I see you’ve finally woken up from your slumber.
^Nevermind that, there’s more important things to discuss.
^Like where is the Elder? That’d be a good start.
^Woah what’s up with the urgency. Anyway, the last time I saw him, he was walking around the village looking for something
^Around the village.. Can you be more specific?
^I bet my only 2 coins on the fact that he’s at the very bottom of the stairs.
^At his age, I would assume he would avoid walking up. His back is not what it used to be
